examples.example: 我满怀期待地走进那充满知识的图书馆。

translate.english: I walked into that knowledge-filled library full of expectations.

examples.example: 我兴高采烈地走进那美丽的花园。

translate.english: I walked into that beautiful garden happily.

examples.example: 他面带微笑自信地走进那间宽敞明亮的会议室。

translate.english: He walked into that spacious and bright meeting room with a smile on his face and full of confidence.
